items.title: IFS Launches Emissions Management with Climatiq
items.summary:
*IFS partners with Climatiq to integrate a new Emissions Management module into IFS Cloud.*
- This module uses Climatiq’s carbon data engine to automate and improve *carbon footprint tracking* for industries.
- The collaboration aims to embed *sustainability* into daily business operations, helping companies meet global emissions standards and make *data-driven, greener decisions.*

items.title: Divcon develops advanced controls for liquid-cooled data centers
items.summary:
- **Divcon Controls** played a key role in creating *smart control solutions* for Aligned Data Centers' new *Advanced Cooling Lab* in Phoenix.
- These solutions focus on *managing fluid dynamics, integrating diverse assets, and adapting to fluctuating IT loads*, optimizing *energy efficiency and sustainability*.
- The company's expertise supports *hybrid cooling* systems, enabling *future-proof, high-density AI and HPC data centers* with enhanced reliability and environmental responsibility.

items.title: ISA 2025 Automation Summit & Expo in Florida
items.summary:
*The ISA 2025 Automation Summit & Expo* will be held October 5-7 at Disney’s Coronado Springs Resort, featuring *tech discussions*, a *vendor expo*, and *keynote speakers* including NASA astronaut Douglas Hurley and cybersecurity expert Tom Liston.

Participants can explore *industry standards*, *cybersecurity*, and *AI impacts*, with activities like a *student VR showcase* and a *Awards Gala* at Disney’s Animal Kingdom.

Event offers *networking*, *certification courses*, and *exhibitor opportunities* amid leading companies like Honeywell, Rockwell Automation, and Mitsubishi Electric, emphasizing *professional growth* in automation fields.

items.title: 40 Years of Aucotec: From Software Pioneer to Digital Nervous System for Industry
items.summary:
*Aucotec AG celebrates 40 years of innovation since its founding in 1985.*

- The company has evolved from early products like Elcad to the comprehensive Engineering Base platform, central to modern industrial engineering.
- It has expanded globally, opening new offices and forming key partnerships in Industry 4.0 developments.
- Looking forward, Aucotec aims to integrate **AI** and **digital twins** to enhance its engineering solutions, emphasizing **sustainability** and **digital transformation**.

**Keywords:** industry automation, engineering software, digital twin, Industry 4.0, global expansion, AI

items.title: Will Amazon’s Rollout Ignite Growth in the Right-Fit Boxing Solutions Market?
items.summary:
- **Amazon** plans to expand its deployment of automated *right-fit boxing* machines across Europe, starting with the UK and Germany.
- This move is likely to **accelerate industry adoption**, as Amazon’s influence encourages competitors to adopt similar solutions.
- The investment aims to **boost operational efficiency, meet upcoming regulations** (like the EU's PPWR), and support the **growth of e-commerce** by optimizing packaging and delivery processes.

- Beckhoff emphasised the importance of *collaborative innovation* and encourages next-generation engineers to keep inventing and pursuing progress.

items.title: Prima Power Expands Cologna Veneta Plant
items.summary:
- *Prima Power* has expanded its Cologna Veneta facility by 2,500 sqm, increasing capacity by 50% for sheet metal bending.
- The new building features a **photovoltaic system** and a modern service area, emphasizing *sustainability* and better working conditions.
- The expansion enhances the plant's role as an **all-in-one** bending hub, integrating advanced robotic and servo-electric technologies to support *market growth* and *technological innovation*.

- The **SuperFlex** is designed for **speed, precision,** and **compactness**, supporting a wide range of packaging configurations.
- Its **space-saving design** and adaptability address modern industry needs for faster changeovers, SKU variability, and future-proofing packaging lines.

items.title: Ultra-Low Voltage, Ultra-High Potential: 5 Trends
items.summary:
*The market for ULV motors and drives is expanding due to five key factors:*
- *Growth in mobile robotics, warehouse automation, and semiconductor fabrication* are driving demand.
- *Increasing automation of small axes* and the replacement of pneumatic systems are also critical trends.
- The convergence of *digitalization, energy efficiency*, and *technological advancements* signals a new phase in motion control industry growth.

DigiKey Adds Over 32,000 New Products in Q2 2025
items.summary:
*DigiKey expanded its in-stock inventory by adding more than 32,000 NPIs in Q2 2025, bringing the total to over 16.5 million products.*
- The expansion included over 236,000 new products and 127 new suppliers, enhancing offerings in wireless, power, interconnect, and automation.
- New suppliers like DeGirum, Minew, NanoFlowX, and Shelly USA introduced innovative solutions such as AI development tools, IoT devices, nanotech coatings, and smart automation products.*

items.title: Mikrotron Camera Reduces Foam in Industrial Tanks
items.summary:
*Researchers used Mikrotron's high-speed camera to analyze foam formation in stirred tanks.*
- The study highlights how *impeller design and operating conditions* influence foam height and bubble size.*
- Future work aims to correlate foam parameters with *fluid properties* for better industrial foam control strategies.*

items.title: Penguin Solutions Announces Leadership Changes
items.summary:

- These changes aim to enhance *growth*, support *product innovation*, and improve *go-to-market strategies*.
- The restructuring also involves the departure of *Pete Manca*, emphasizing a shift towards a more traditional leadership model.

items.title: inno-spec Celebrates 20 Years of Innovation
items.summary:

- The company has a legacy of *collaboration* with EVK DI Kerschhaggl, focusing on automated sorting and monitoring.  
- Looking ahead, inno-spec aims to *expand* its technology application across diverse industries, enhancing its hardware and software solutions.

items.title: How Can Robots Make Your Manufacturing Plant More Efficient?
items.author: Buddharatn Ratawal
items.summary:
- **Robots enhance productivity** by performing tasks faster and around the clock. 
- They help **reduce costs** through lower labor needs and less material waste. 
- By taking on **dangerous jobs**, robots improve safety and allow for reprogramming to adapt to changing production demands.

items.title: Davis Mathews Appointed CEO of Phoenix Contact
items.summary:

- His leadership will focus on enhancing customer connections and adapting to *Industry 4.0* challenges.
- Mathews brings over 30 years of experience within the company, positioning Phoenix for a new chapter in the competitive U.S. market.

items.title: Silicon Wafer Shipments Rise 10% YoY in Q2 2025
items.summary:
- SEMI reported a *9.6% increase* in worldwide silicon wafer shipments for Q2 2025. 
- Demand for silicon wafers, particularly for **AI data-center chips**, remains strong despite low fab utilization for other devices. 
- Future trends in this industry may be affected by *geopolitical and supply chain dynamics*.

items.title: Critical Manufacturing Acquires Convanit for AI Expansion
items.summary:
- *Critical Manufacturing* has acquired **Convanit**, enhancing its Data Platform with *AI-powered image analytics*.
- Convanit's *c-Alice* solution enables quick, *custom AI model* development for visual inspection without deep expertise.
- The acquisition aims to improve *manufacturing precision* and *automation*, responding to industry challenges in quality and traceability.

items.title: AI Adoption in S&P 500 Firms Brings New Security Challenges

items.title: LK Metrology Expands Into Industrial CT by Acquiring Procon X-Ray
items.summary:

- ProCon X-Ray, known for high-resolution X-ray technology, will expand LK's inspection offerings across various *industries*.
- The collaboration aims to develop new, integrated metrology solutions, reinforcing LK Metrology’s position as a leading provider in the *measurement sector*.

items.title: What Manufacturers Gain by Listening to Their Machines During Volatile Times
items.author: Brian Germain
items.summary:
*Manufacturers are facing high input costs and talent shortages in 2025, pushing them to rethink maintenance strategies.*  
*Condition-based maintenance, supported by real-time data and AI, enables targeted resource allocation, mitigating risks and avoiding unnecessary servicing.*  
*This proactive approach enhances operational resilience, ensuring machines get the attention they need while adapting to rapid changes in production demands.*

items.title: Okuma's Strategic Growth Initiatives

items.title: Siemens' Vision for Connected Industry at SPS Atlanta 2025

items.title: Industrial Connectors in AI-driven Manufacturing
items.author: Lee Slater
items.summary:
- *AI is revolutionizing manufacturing*, shifting from static to adaptive systems that rely on robust connectors. 
- Connectors must ensure *high data throughput and signal integrity* while withstanding harsh environments to support real-time data exchange. 
- Smart connectors play a key role in *predictive maintenance*, enabling proactive interventions and the flexibility required in modern modular automation systems.

items.title: Dr. Philipp Nellessen Appointed New CEO

items.title: Powering Industrial IoT with 5G and IFPP
items.author: Sönke Schröder
items.summary:
- *Private 5G networks* provide reliable, low-latency connectivity essential for industrial environments. 
- *IFPP* enhances security through seamless and rapid device onboarding, maintaining control over device identity. 
- Together, they create a robust infrastructure, driving efficiency and resilience in the growing *Industrial IoT* landscape.

items.title: NEMA Commends Prioritization of Grid Expansion, Modernization

items.title: Allgon's 2024 Annual Report Highlights Resilience

items.title: Automating From Above: Why Vertical Robotics Is No Longer Optional
items.author: Mathias Entenmann
items.summary:
- Manufacturers face *urgent labor shortages* and need innovative solutions. 
- **Vertical robotics** maximizes space efficiency and operational flexibility beyond traditional floor constraints. 
- The transition to overhead automation can **transform** industrial operations, facilitating growth without extensive infrastructure changes.
